vote.title: An ordinance amending Chapter 28, "Motor Vehicles and Traffic," and Chapter 43, “Streets and Sidewalks,” of the Dallas City Code by (1) amending the regulations for dockless vehicles and motor-assisted scooters; and (2) deleting the sunset date on allowing motor-assisted scooters to operate on certain city streets and sidewalks - Financing: No cost consideration to the City
vote.description: An ordinance amending Chapter 28, "Motor Vehicles and Traffic," and Chapter 43, “Streets and Sidewalks,” of the Dallas City Code by (1) amending the regulations for dockless vehicles and motor-assisted scooters; and (2) deleting the sunset date on allowing motor-assisted scooters to operate on certain city streets and sidewalks - Financing: No cost consideration to the City
